attributes.action: To help Iraqi interpreters and others involved on intelligence and military operations who have risked their lives to help us by allowing accelerated entry to this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those Iraqi unterpreters and others, and their families, who have been of direct assistance to our military intelligence and operations in Iraq will be in the gravest danger when this country leaves Iraq.

To expect these people to leave their country - lord only knows how - and get to this country in order to apply for refugee status is quite futile and the government knows it.

These peoples families need to get out before we leave, not later, and the only people in a position to make a rational decision as to who is in danger are those on the ground working with them not some faceless bureaucratic in Whitehall.

From a purely selfish standpoint who is likely to help us again if we abandon these people !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
